meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a bumpkin.
meanings.sent1: The man's bumpkinish attire stood out in the city crowd.
meanings.sent2: Her bumpkinish accent revealed her rural roots.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bumpkinish appearance, he was surprisingly knowledgeable about city life.
meanings.sent4: The old farmhouse had a bumpkinish charm that was endearing.
meanings.sent5: The bumpkinish decorations gave the party a cozy feel.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a manner typical of a bumpkin.
meanings.sent1: She felt bumpkinish as she struggled to use the fancy utensils.
meanings.sent2: His bumpkinish behavior at the formal event embarrassed his friends.
meanings.sent3: The city slickers found his bumpkinish antics amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her bumpkinish ways clashed with the sophisticated atmosphere of the restaurant.
meanings.sent5: He tried to hide his bumpkinish habits when visiting the upscale neighborhood.
